import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { UserbackService } from 'src/app/services/userback.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-forgot-password', templateUrl: './forgot-password.component.html', styleUrls: ['./forgot-password.component.css'] }) export class ForgotPasswordComponent { email: string = ''; constructor(private userbackService: UserbackService, private router: Router) { } token(){} }
